title: Ling Mao Bu Jun Xin
overview: The cat demon was supposed to go to hell or heaven, but instead she was reborn again. She remembers the past and must find the murderer who sent her to the other world. At the same time, she meets a man she once loved who doesn't know her past. The cat demon must now decide whether to continue the relationship with him or become a servant of the Demon King.~~ Adapted from the web comic "Cat Demon's Seduction" (猫妖的诱惑) by Qing Yu Gaffey (青玉Gaffey)
